response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This item is worth $15,000 to you, and I believe it could significantly enhance your life or business. After careful consideration, I am extending a special offer to purchase this product at a price of $13,000. I am confident that this price reflects the true worth of the product while allowing you to enjoy substantial savings. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am looking forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 13000}
